techmeme.title: A massive outage has affected Verizon customers since around 10AM ET, according to reports on Downdetector from subscribers across the US (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
Source: SoftBank's Vision Fund has agreed to invest $500M in OpenAI's latest funding round, SoftBank's first investment in OpenAI, which is raising $6.5B (The Information)
The UK FCA says a man pleaded guilty to illegally operating a crypto ATM network, which processed £2.6M across various locations, as it cracks down on such ATMs (Camomile Shumba/CoinDesk)
AMD releases BIOS updates to boost the performance of its Ryzen 9600X and 9700X processors, around a month after disappointing Zen 5 desktop CPU reviews (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Qodo, which offers code generation and testing tools to the enterprise, raised a $40M Series A led by Susa Ventures and Square Peg (Frederic Lardinois/TechCrunch)
